physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 39.7°C; Heart rate: Not specified; Blood pressure: Not specified; Respiratory rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Fever, chills, fatigue, weakness, nausea, vomiting, unsteady gait, needing assistance to walk, decreased oral intake, tremulousness of the arms and jaw.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient became progressively less interactive over the next 2 days.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient appeared uncomfortable and ill, was trembling, alert and oriented, followed commands with single-word answers, dry oral mucous membranes.

Somnolent, nonverbal, unable to follow commands, intermittent eye opening, tracking with conjugate gaze, brisk deep-tendon reflexes, nuchal rigidity, systolic ejection murmur (grade 2/6), no movement of arms after pressure to fingernail beds.
